channel.title: Projects on Param Attri
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Param Attri

item.title: COVID-19 Detector
item.description: Created a tool that detect COVID-19 in X-Ray images to help doctors to have a quick insight about the patient’s condition. Used Image Data Augmentation to increase and generalize the model. Used pre-trained VGG16 model to achieve the best results. Achieved Accuracy ~ 98%, Sensitivity ~ 95% and Specificity = 100%. Built a client facing API using Flask. Technologies Used: Python, Tensorflow, Keras & Flask. GitHub Repository

item.title: COVID-19 Tracker
item.description: Built a Dashboard that shows number of COVID-19 cases in India on a Choropleth Map. Application also allow users to view and interact with India’s State-wise cases on a Bar Graph using Drop-down menu. Deployed the Web Application on Heroku Cloud Platform. Technologies Used: Python, Plotly & Dash. GitHub Repository Website
